history.content:
I have taken Math W53. The workload was exactly what it probably would have been if I had taken the regular version. There were "check your understanding" quizzes due twice a week (basically participation/accountability for watching the lectures), graded quizzes due twice a week (like the quizzes you would take in discussion section), and homeworks due twice a week.

Hutchings' video lectures are great, and all of the staff are very helpful on the discussion forums.

The only problem I had was that I had false expectations about my ability to stay on track with the course when I was working a full time internship during the day and doing Math W53 homework at night.

Let me know if you have any more specific questions.

children.subject: I would say the workload is very manageable but a little more than I had anticipated. Similar to the response given above I had a full-time internship during the day and did the class at night (and watched lectures on the train I commuted on). Lectures take about 3-5 hours a week to watch. There are about 4-5 sections (2 assignments worth) of hw due a week, basically something (lecture check understanding Qs, quiz, or hw) is due every day except Friday and Sunday if i remember correctly (whether that's a hw assignment, a quiz or the concept questions for the lectures). Quizzes they gave 2 hours to complete which included the time it took you to get it scanned and uploaded to bcourses. The TAs were really helpful if you reach out to them (I video chatted a few times with one of them when it got close to the final). If you're taking it proctored be sure to give yourself time to find the building at the college you take it at i was almost late. All in all I would recommend the course just plan on giving yourself about 14-20 hours a week on it.

history.content:
Has anyone taken an online course at Berkeley? Preferably online Math 53?

Can you elaborate on your experience? How was the work load? What did you like/dislike about it?

Thanks!
history.subject: Online Math 53
